crossOrigin.description: The crossorigin attribute to use for generated javascript script tags.  One of 'none' | 'anonymous' | 'use-credentials'

main.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

tsConfig.description: The name of the Typescript configuration file.

outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files.

deleteOutputPath.description: Delete the output path before building.

baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.

deployUrl.description: URL where the application will be deployed.

vendorChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

commonChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

runtimeChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing the runtime.

sourceMap.description: Output sourcemaps. Use 'hidden' for use with error reporting tools without generating sourcemap comment.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

index.description: HTML File which will be contain the application

scripts.description: External Scripts which will be included before the main application entry

styles.description: External Styles which will be included with the application

budgets.description: Budget thresholds to ensure parts of your application stay within boundaries which you set.

namedChunks.description: Names the produced bundles according to their entry file

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors.

includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.

optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

es2015Polyfills.description: Conditional polyfills loaded in browsers which do not support ES2015.

subresourceIntegrity.description: Enables the use of subresource integrity validation.

statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as: 'webpack-bundle-analyzer' or <https://webpack.github.io/analyse>.

extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file, in the case of production builds only.

memoryLimit.description: Memory limit for type checking service process in MB. (defaults to 2048)

maxWorkers.description: Number of workers to use for type checking. (defaults to # of CPUS - 2)

fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.

generateIndexHtml.description: Generates `index.html` file to the output path. This can be turned off if using a webpack plugin to generate HTML such as `html-webpack-plugin`

postcssConfig.description: Set a path to PostCSS config that applies to the app and all libs. Defaults to `undefined`, which auto-detects postcss.config.js files in each app/lib directory.

webpackConfig.description: Path to a function which takes a webpack config, some context and returns the resulting webpack config

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.

maximumWarning.description: The maximum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

maximumError.description: The maximum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

minimumWarning.description: The minimum threshold for warning relative to the baseline.

minimumError.description: The minimum threshold for error relative to the baseline.

warning.description: The threshold for warning relative to the baseline (min & max).

error.description: The threshold for error relative to the baseline (min & max).

bundleName.description: The bundle name for this extra entry point.

inject.description: If the bundle will be referenced in the HTML file.
